name: RCOMS
overview:
r-Coms provides supply and demand solutions connecting people sharing similar needs and interests whenever and wherever they are

Based on Geo-location and location based services, r-Coms is developing native-web and mobile software solutions easily integrated in a wide range of sectors. r-Coms provides supply and demand solutions connecting people sharing similar needs and interests whenever and wherever they are.

r-Coms is a truly landmark company, initiated and founded by three innovative and driven entrepreneurs blending a background of Information Technology, Strategic management, Business development, sales and marketing. r-Coms is a revolutionary approach to communication aiming to rally the virtual and the real and bring real value to the end consumer. Our Goal is to create products & services that bring Real Value to our clients.
